reviewText: great movie for the kids to learn the bible. My four year old grandson loved the movie and had lots to say after the movie was over.
Title: The Story of Noah

reviewText: My 2 1/2 yr old grandson was attentive to the dvd, but we ultimately turned it off because the story does not stickto scripture.  It's like a Hollywood-ized version of most Bible stories or characters, in an animated version.
summary: Not accurate according to the Bible….
Title: The Story of Noah

reviewText: A delightful video for children (and adults) of all ages.  Artfully done and easily explainable to all.  I highly recommend this video for introducing children to Biblical stories and for refreshing memories of those who already know the story.
Title: The Story of Noah

reviewText: I absolutly love these movies. They help me to introduce many of the bible stories to my daughter. She really enjoys them!
Title: The Story of Noah

reviewText: I got this as Christmas gift for 3 years old son. we didn't open it yet. I bet he will love this!
Title: The Story of Noah
